summary: Dominate your prey with the Bow of Domination.
descriptionHtml:
This is just something I made in the Creation Kit, nothing serious, just a bow that I\'d enjoy using (My first mod).

This bow is based off of the Elven Bow and has a higher base-damage than the Daedric Bow. (Doesn\'t require Elven or Daedric Smithing Skills).

Simple to make; 1 Briar Heart, 1 Quicksilver Ingot, 2 Moonstone Ingots.

The bow has a chance to paralyze your target for 6 seconds (which is why it\'s called the domination bow).

Installation: Drop \"Bow of Domination.esp\" into your Skyrim Data Folder (C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)

Uninstalling: Delete \"Bow of Domination.esp\" from your Skyrim Data Folder.
author: LunchtimeLevelup
